responses.label: Features
responses.text: Our product comes with a variety of features that cater to your specific needs.

responses.label: Refund
responses.text: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you’re not satisfied with our product.

responses.label: Upgrade
responses.text: You can upgrade your plan at any time by logging into your account.

responses.label: Demo
responses.text: We offer a free demo of our product to help you make an informed decision.

responses.label: Compatibility
responses.text: Our product is compatible with most modern browsers and devices.

responses.label: Cost
responses.text: We have multiple billing options. You can pay yearly and save 10%

responses.label: Promotion
responses.text: We do offer discounts for our best customers.

responses.label: Technical Issue
responses.text: Please provide us with more details regarding the issue you’re facing so that we can assist you better.

responses.label: Billing Issue
responses.text: Please provide us with your account details so that we can look into the billing issue you’re facing.

responses.label: Customer Feedback
responses.text: We appreciate your feedback and will do our best to improve our product and services.

responses.label: Cancel Subscription
responses.text: You can cancel your subscription at any time by logging into your account and navigating to the subscription section.

responses.label: Account Verification
responses.text: For security purposes, we may require you to verify your account before we can proceed with your request.

responses.label: Forgot Password
responses.text: You can reset your password here at https://example.com/passwordreset
